content: simple toe up socks created by lisa overby simple toe up sock pattern techniques used turkish cast on magic loop kfb increases fleegle heel and a stretchy bind off © 2019 yarn twisters 1 simple toe up socks materials & info abbreviations yarn 1 skein yarn twisters rylyn 420 yards/ bobble - bind off 115g 80% sw merino 20% nylon or any fingering weight yarn bn - bottom needle gauge 36 sts by 48 row equal 4 by 4 in co - cast on stockinette in the round after blocking k - knit needles 2 25 mm us 1 40 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge kfb - knit front back knit into the front of the stitch leaving on the left-hand needle knit notions removable stitch marker darning into the back of the same stitch dropping the needle stitch off the left-hand needle 1 stitch increased finished sizes approx foot circumference worn with approx 0-1 of k2tog - knit 2 together insert needle into the negative ease next 2 sts knit the 2 sts together as one 1 st decreased size 1 7 women s shoe size 4 - 6 5 size 2 8 women s shoe size 7 - 9 5 p - purl size 3 9 women s shoe size 10 - 12 5 notes p2tog - purl 2 together insert needle into the next 2 sts purl the 2 sts together as one 1 st pattern is written for magic loop technique decreased round - round ssk - slip slip knit slip 2 sts knit wise one at a time to the right hand needle place sts back on left hand needle and knit them together through their back loops 1 st decreased st/sts - stitch/stitches tn - top needle pattern instructions using the turkish co co 16 20 24 sts 8 begin foot pattern on tn 10 12 sts per needle round 1 tn k bn k link to turkish co https //www youtube com/ repeat until the work reaches the point where watch v=wxv6bwy4-f8 the leg connects for the foot approx 5 5 6 6 5 begin increasing for the gusset round 1 tn k bn k round 2 tn kfb k to 2 sts remaining kfb k1 gusset increases bn kfb k to 2 sts remaining kfb k1 4 sts increased round 1 tn k bn kfb k to 2 sts remaining kfb k1 round 2 tn k bn k repeat rnds 1 & 2 until you have increased to 56 60 64 sts 28 30 32 sts per needle © 2019 yarn twisters 2 simple toe up socks repeat these 2 rnds until you have increased slip 1 purlwise k to 1 st before the gap ssk to 54 58 62 sts on the bn k1 you will now be at the end of the bn and will begin to knit in the round again knit 1 more round on tn tn k bn k1 k2tog k to 2 sts
